Last year, in general what was the most common response to problems faced within the business?

We resolved the problems and took action to try to ensure they do not happen again
We resolved the problems and had a continuous improvement process to anticipate similar problems in advance No action was taken

questions.text: As of now, in general what is the most common response to problems faced within the business?
options: We resolve the problems but do not take further action

We resolve the problems and have a continuous improvement process to anticipate similar problems in advance No action is taken
